name: adminbookmarklet
description: Dynamic Bookmarklet to quickly access the backend of your tool

scripts.uglify:minify: uglifyjs adminBookmarklet.js -o adminBookmarklet.min.js -c sequences=true -c dead_code=true -c conditionals=true -c booleans=true -c unused=true -c if_return=true -c join_vars=true -c drop_console=true -m -r --screw-ie8 -b beautify=false -b quote_style=1
scripts.uglify: yarn run uglify:minify && yarn run uglify:prepend
scripts.compile: yarn run uglify && yarn run pug:compile
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:pug && yarn run lint:html && yarn run lint:js
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:unit
scripts.build: yarn run compile && yarn run test && yarn clean

author: Tom Lutzenberger
